lead_paragraph: As the new year begins, At War is taking a look at a series by our Washington correspondents dubbed "The Next War." The articles examine the American military and the decisions confronting it in a new age of austerity, from the cuts to come, to the costs of technology and the vision of a newer, leaner fighting force.
